Subject: Penguicon Board Meeting
Description: You've done the convention, you've met the staff, and you've even socialized with the ConCom.  But what about those *other* Penguicon people?  Those shadowy figures that create the multi-year rules, have their fingers on the money, and cause a ConChair to mysteriously appear every year in a puff of penguin-scented smoke?  Ever wonder what the Penguicon Board of Directors does in their secret sanctum, and where they are taking Penguicon?  Come to the Board of Directors meeting and see!  Speakers include:Steve Gutterman, Randy Bradakis, Matt Arnold, Jer Lance,Amanda Long-Adams, Gini Judd, James Hice - Track: Penguicon  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
